name: Sublime
description: Meet Sublime.  She's around tonight, exhibiting a big-time sensuality extravaganza. Not even the moon can resist her outrageously red lips or the beautiful and perfect silhouette. Rise and shine!  As I'm a "comic book guy," this piece was heavily inspired by the work of Frank Miller in the Sin City graphic novel. So, I ended up playing with the shadow/light duality, adding my common elements from other artworks.   [Previously minted on OpenSea. Now on H=N]
